abstract: Vikram Pandit’s rise at Citigroup has been fast and furious. But, Financial News wonders, can he recreate his success at Morgan Stanley at such a substantially different institution?
lead_paragraph: Vikram Pandit’s rise at Citigroup has been fast and furious. But, Financial News wonders, can he recreate his success at Morgan Stanley at such a substantially different institution?

headline.main: Is Pandit the Right Man to Save Citi?
